text: 7.37: Ais 35.5Mbe ne bun nzuaim, mba gumgi gu mbigi ne mbararagiap, guigira ŋgava mbatɨga muuŋgiap, thɨri tuigap, khaŋ nzuai, “Ana za kha bigi ga mbuav nzerara nta mbui guma ma. Ana khuarani ŋangi guman muuŋgirim, ana taagi buni mbararagi. Ana vhɨra buni suangeŋ kakagi guman muuŋgirim, ana taagi tuituigia buni nzuai.”
